title: Gaĭ-Kodzor
description: Village in Krasnodar Krai, Russia, located 9 km. southeast of Anapa. Between 1972 and 1986, several separate coin hoards dated to the late Bosporan Kingdom (4th century CE) were found on a farm at the edge of the village.

properties.description: Point representing the approximate centerpoint of the three primary findspots of coin hoards at Gai-Kodzor, from Google Earth after Abramzon 2019b.
properties.title: Approximate imagery location of Gai-Kodzor findspots
